'Domination' (alternative title: 'Massive Assault: Phantom Renaissance') is a
science fiction turn-based tactics game and is the third incarnation of Massive
Assault with the subtitle âMassive Assault Like Never Beforeâ. During the
Galactic Revolution, you can side with either the Free Nations Union or the
Phantom League to decide the outcome of the conflict.
